amendment.description: Amendment makes "Pay For Success" initiatives an allowable use of funds for States and Local Educational Agencies to improve outcomes and save money by training and supporting teachers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in Part B of House Report 114-29 to "Makes Pay For Success" initiatives an allowable use of funds for States and Local Educational Agencies to improve outcomes and save money by training and supporting teachers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Delaney amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Delaney amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Delaney.
